Posts.EditableText:
Hello,
I am making a website for my text-adventure game and I was wondering: Is there a widget or a plug-in for Quest and, if so, which one would be the best one? Note: I am making the website in WordPress.
Posts.HTML:
Hello,
I am making a website for my text-adventure game and I was wondering: Is there a widget or a plug-in for Quest and, if so, which one would be the best one? Note: I am making the website in WordPress.

Posts.EditableText:
I don't like plug ins. Widgets are good. Quest does have a downloadable program. I don't know if Quest has a plug in or widget.

Quest program download link. http://textadventures.co.uk/quest/desktop
